abstract: Hundreds of enthusiastic Indians came out to greet Warren E. Buffett as the Oracle of Omaha looked for business opportunities in their country.
snippet: Hundreds of enthusiastic Indians came out to greet Warren E. Buffett as the Oracle of Omaha looked for business opportunities in their country.
lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI — The billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett capped off a weeklong visit to India by doing one of the things he does best, after investing — doling out folksy sayings and sensible advice to an appreciative crowd.

headline.main: Buffett Draws Fervent Fans in India With His Folksy Advice
